name: Take Care of Little Fellas Extended
name_original: Take Care of Little Fellas Extended
description:
Extinguish the fires!

Those little fellas are living in their small world, in a matchbox. You should keep the fire at bay as long as you can!

I hope you enjoy to play my game as much as I had fun making it and learning new things with the GameMaker!

How to play

Use mouse to play.

- Click smokes/fires until they are extinguished.
  - You can also keep the mouse over fire to put it out, but it slower than clicking!
- You have limited water supply
  - You can replenish it a little by picking up small water containers randomly spawned
- The faster you are the less water you need to put out the fire

Assets

- Musics with Figure (iOS-app)
- Sound effects with [jfxr](https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/#)
- Graphics drawn in Aseprite

Made with GameMaker Studio 2

I also participated with this to GM48 34th jam, but that version does not have all the features and fixes as this LDJAM version because the GM48 jam ended earlier.

Therefore the title has the Extended.
